Texts.Eng:
Living data constructs. Fragile in the physical realm, but nimble and dangerous.
  Diet: Does not eat.

^orange;Perks^reset;:
  +^green;15^reset;% Speed, Energy x^green;1.25^reset;
  ^green;When 50% or higher in energy, gain minor health regen^reset;
  Immunity: Oxygen
  Resist: +^green;20^reset;% Ice, Cosmic and Shadow
  
^orange;Weapons^reset;:
  Assault Rifle/Dagger/Whipblade: Damage x^green;1.1^reset;, +^green;2^reset;% Crit Chance
  Machine Pistol: Damage x^green;1.1^reset;, +^green25^reset;% Crit Damage

^red;Weaknesses^reset;:
  Resist: -^red;40^reset;% Electric, -^red;25^reset;% Physical, -^red;20^reset;% Fire & Radiation
